### Water Treatment Services at the Central Experimental Farm in Ottawa

#### Tender Details

* **Title (English/French)**: Water Treatment Services - Central Experimental Farm in Ottawa / Services de traitement des eaux - Ferme expérimentale centrale à Ottawa
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-995-62576384 / cb-995-62576384
* **Amendment Number (English/French)**: 3 / 3
* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 01B46-24-004 / 01B46-24-004
* **Publication Date (English/French)**: February 28, 2024 / Février 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: April 5, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST / April 5, 2024, 2:00 p.m. HAE
* **Amendment Date (English/French)**: April 5, 2024 / Avril 5, 2024

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date (English/French)**: May 1, 2024 / Mai 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date (English/French)**: April 30, 2025 / Avril 30, 2025
* **Regions of Delivery (English/French)**: Ottawa / Ottawa
* **Procurement Category (English/French)**: SRV / SRV

#### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires a service program for the treatment of its water used in open recirculating and closed heating/cooling systems at the Central Experimental Farm (CEF) in Ottawa. The services will be performed from May 1, 2024, to April 30, 2025, with the possibility of extending the contract for up to two optional periods of two years each.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this tender are based on the "Lowest Price" method. Bidders are required to submit their proposals in both English and French.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Claudia Lauzier at (438) 455-2392 or via email at [claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca).
